reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate of arteriosclerosis (atherosclerotic and arteriosclerotic arterial disease) summing: atherosclerotic coronary disease (~50), cerebrovascular disease (~25), peripheral arterial disease (~20), other arterial sclerosis (~25) = ~120 per 100k. Low confidence due to definitional overlap and heterogeneity.
source: Aggregate estimate from cardiovascular epidemiology literature
